comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: www.navsource.org/archives/01/19b.htm uses this image, and claims this photo is from 17 July 1913. From 6 July to 29 December 1913, Louisiana traveled from east coast ports to Mexican waters. She stood by to protect American lives and property and to help enforce both the Monroe Doctrine and the arms embargo which had been established to discourage further revolutionary disturbances In Mexico. She was part of the original Great White Fleet.

comment._content: thanks for the date and the source. We'll fix the date in the source data and reload the description.
